values: 商店；工作室；车间；工厂；工场；作坊；维修厂；销售点；专卖店；零售店；修理铺；工艺室；工坊；工具贮藏室
购物；逛商店；采购；搜索比较（以找到最佳商品或价格）；向警方提供（犯罪信息）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 装作顾客在商店偷窃（shoplift的ing形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指规模较小，出售同一类商品的店铺。
在美国指出售同一类商品的小型商店。在英国用复数形式表示百货商店。
作商店解时，是美国英语，通常写为department store。

word_group.brief_definition: 购物清单, 采购清单
说行话, 三句话不离本行(尤指当着外行的面)
赌注登记所；彩票经理部

bilingual.source: There is a girl in the shop.
There are not any oranges in the shop.

bilingual.target: 好极了！我们一起去商店吧！
罗宾，博物馆商店在哪里？

bilingual.source: I also went to the shop with my classmates.

list.abstract: shop（英[ʃɒp]，美[ʃɑːp]），英语单词。作名词为商店；店铺；车间。作动词为购物；采购；告发。短语搭配为coffee shop（咖啡店）。例句：You can really get into the charm of old things by visiting a junk shop （旧货店）.（逛逛旧货店，你可以真正领略到旧物的魅力）。 作名词时，近义词有store、market。作动词时，近义词为make a purchase。反义词是boycott。

yingyinNormal.en: Supermarket. Bye. Music shop. Bye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，超市到了！再见！乐器商店到了！再见！

yingyinNormal.en: They're selling ratings for fees. A ratings shop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们拿评级来卖钱，像商店一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr Fox’s Shop
yingyinNormal.zh: 狐狸先生的商店

yingyinNormal.en: Mr Fox's Shop
yingyinNormal.zh: 第4季第6集《狐狸先生的商店》

yingyinNormal.en: It would be, if we didn't know the Shop already had the tech for it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是很难相信，但我们知道"商店"已经有了这种技术。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Mr. Fox's shop. Mr. Fox's shop sells everything. I'm sure we'll find you a lovely new dinosaur here, George. Dinosaur. George does not want a new dinosaur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里是狐狸先生的商店。在狐狸先生的商店里什么都买得到。我相信在这里你一定能找到一个新的恐龙玩具乔治。恐龙！乔治并不想要一只新的恐龙，

yingyinNormal.en: It sounds funny. That's why I'm going to the music shop to get it mended. Woo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这听上去有点奇怪。所以我现在要去乐器商店把它修理一下。喔。

yingyinNormal.en: How did she find that out? She's been chasing human traffickers, ones with connection to the Shop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她怎么发现的？她在追踪和"商店"勾结的人贩子。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold tight. Mr. Bull is waiting for the bus. One ticket to the music shop please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓紧了！公牛先生在等公共汽车。哞，我要一张去乐器商店的票，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and Suzy can be shopkeepers. Everyone else can be customers. Peppa and Suzy are going to run a pretend shop. What do we have to do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和苏西，你们来做商店的主人。其他人呢，可以做客人。佩奇和苏西准备来开一家假想的商店。佩奇，我们要来做点什么呢?

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and Suzy can be shopkeepers. Everyone else can be customers. Peppa and Suzy are going to run a pretend shop. What do we have to do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和苏西，你们来做商店的主人。其他人呢，可以做客人。佩奇和苏西准备来开一家假想的商店。佩奇，我们要来做点什么呢?

yingyinNormal.en: It is morning. Peppa is taking Teddy Playgroup to the supermarket. This shop sells everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在是早上，佩奇带着小熊泰迪来到了超市。这个商店什么都有的。

yingyinNormal.en: Place in the right positions, these operatives would give the Shop incredible access and power.
yingyinNormal.zh: 将他们安置在合适的位置，这些特工就能给"商店"带来一切访问权和巨大的权力。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George have one penny and two buttons to spend. OK, let's go shopping. This is Mr. Fox's shop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治的储蓄罐里有一枚硬币和两颗纽扣。好，我们去买礼物吧。这里是狐狸先生的商店。

yingyinNormal.en: Welcome to the moon shop. We've got moon maps, moon books and we've even got a picture of piggies on the moon with an elephant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎来到月球商店。我们有月球地图，月球书籍甚至还有佩奇和埃德蒙在月球上的照片。

yingyinNormal.en: Impressive. Huh. Seeing as you've returned the Valentino, and you've logged ten hours of volunteer work with Betty at the shop...
yingyinNormal.zh: 真不错，看在你归还了华伦天奴，而且和贝蒂一块在商店做足了10小时义工的份上...

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, I used the manufacturer's serial number and tracked down where it's distributed to. It was a shop in Dupont Circle. And who did it call?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我用了生产序列号追踪到了它的经销商所在地。是在杜邦环岛的一家商店。打给了谁？

yingyinNormal.en: It came together for me after Alex intercepted the Shop's latest shipment, four Pakistani men, all the same physical type.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾丽克丝最近截获一批"商店"的货物，是四个巴基斯坦人时，我就想明白了，他们体型完全相同。

yingyinNormal.en: My shop has everything. I'm sure you'll find something you like. A big teddy. I love it. This can be the present.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的商店里面应有尽有。保证你在这能找到满意的东西。一个大玩具熊！我喜欢这个。用它当礼物一定很不错。

yingyinNormal.en: My shop has everything. I'm sure you'll find something you like. A big Teddy. I love it. This can be the present.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的商店里面应有尽有。保证你在这能找到满意的东西。一个大玩具熊！我喜欢这个。用它当礼物一定很不错。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 工厂; 车间; 作坊

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 购物者；顾客；购物袋；购物用小轮自行车

word_family.mean: n. 商店；店铺；车间；工场；作坊；办公室；购物；工作室

examination_example.sentence: Buy all your clothes at once with a stylist instead of <highlight>shopping</highlight> alone, one article of clothing at a time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和造型师一起一次性买下你所有的衣服，而不是一个人购物，一次买一件衣服。

examination_example.sentence: It's also a good idea to <highlight>shop</highlight> daily instead of weekly, because, being human, you'll sometimes change your mind about what you fancy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天购物而不是每周购物也是一个好主意，因为作为人，你有时会改变对你喜欢的东西的想法。

examination_example.sentence: Vanity is a constant; people will only start <highlight>shopping</highlight> more sustainably when they can't afford not to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虚荣心是不变的；人们只有在负担不起（非可持续购物方式）时，才会开始用可持续性的方式购物。

sense_info_list.en: a building or part of a building where you can buy goods or services

examination_example.sentence: It may be that the value of Whole Foods to Amazon is not so much the 460 <highlight>shops</highlight> it owns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对亚马逊来说，Whole Foods的价值可能并不在于它拥有的460家门店。

sense_info_list.en: a place where things are made or repaired, especially part of a factory where a particular
sense_info_list.zh: 工厂; 车间; 作坊

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 购物者；顾客；购物袋；购物用小轮自行车

word_family.mean: n. 商店；店铺；车间；工场；作坊；办公室；购物；工作室

examination_example.sentence: Call the repair <highlight>shop</highlight> to fix it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打电话给维修店修理。

examination_example.sentence: Let's go back to my house and we can call the repair <highlight>shop</highlight>, and you can have some tea and cookies too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回我家吧，我们可以给修理店打电话，你也可以喝点茶，吃点饼干。

examination_example.sentence: Listen, I have the number of a really good, affordable computer repair <highlight>shop</highlight> at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听着，我家里有一家很好的，价格适中的电脑维修店。

examination_example.sentence: Everything is at the resort—hotel, beach, <highlight>shopping</highlight> and recreation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 度假村什么都有——酒店、海滩、购物和娱乐。

word_usage.usage: 表示“去购物”，通常应说go shopping。类似的用法还有go swimming 去游泳，go fishing 去钓鱼等。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 购物者；顾客；购物袋；购物用小轮自行车

word_family.mean: n. 商店；店铺；车间；工场；作坊；办公室；购物；工作室

examination_example.sentence: It's not uncommon to be offered many more plastic bags than one could ever need when visiting supermarkets and <highlight>shopping</highlight> malls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你去超市和购物中心时，你会得到更多超出实际需要的塑料袋，这并不罕见。

examination_example.sentence: To promote the use of paper bags for <highlight>shopping</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 推广使用纸袋购物。

examination_example.sentence: The common prescription is to primarily <highlight>shop</highlight> the grocery store, since that's where fresh produce, meat and seafood, and dairy are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常的做法是主要在杂货店购物，因为那里有新鲜农产品、肉类、海鲜和乳制品。

examination_example.sentence: And if you get a broken egg, well, that could happen in a conventional <highlight>shop</highlight>, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的鸡蛋碎了，那么在传统商店里也可能发生。

examination_example.sentence: The food is exactly the same as the stuff you buy in a conventional <highlight>shop</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食物和你在传统商店里买的一模一样。

examination_example.sentence: Two years ago, CEO Chris Cocalis of Pivot Cycles, which sells high-end mountain bikes, found that U. S. bike <highlight>shops</highlight> weren't interested in stocking ebikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两年前，销售高端山地车的Pivot Cycles公司的首席执行官克里斯•科卡利斯发现，美国的自行车商店对供应电动自行车不感兴趣。

word_usage.usage: 表示“去购物”，通常应说go shopping。类似的用法还有go swimming 去游泳，go fishing 去钓鱼等。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 商店；店铺；车间；工场；作坊；办公室；购物；工作室

examination_example.sentence: The tiny <highlight>shops</highlight> made economic sense, according to Robert Kerr, a founder of LoveFone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Love Fone创始人Robert Kerr表示，这些小商店在经济上是有意义的。

examination_example.sentence: Did you say the repair <highlight>shop</highlight> was three blocks away from here?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是说修理店离这里有三个街区远吗？

examination_example.sentence: I can't remember the name of the <highlight>shop</highlight>, but you'll find it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我记不起那家商店的名字了，但你会找到的。

examination_example.sentence: I'm going out for <highlight>shopping</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我要出去购物。

examination_example.sentence: Visit Warner Bros Studio, <highlight>shop</highlight> stop to buy picnic, stay overnight in an approved Youth Hostel, before heading back to Exeter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在返回埃克塞特之前，参观华纳兄弟工作室，购买野餐，在批准的青年旅社过夜。

examination_example.sentence: You have to rely on your experience and on the feel of each pair as you <highlight>shop</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在购物时，你必须依靠自己的经验和每双鞋的感觉。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 购物狂；热衷购物者
n. 购物者；顾客；购物袋；购物用小轮自行车

word_family.mean: n. 商店；店铺；车间；工场；作坊；办公室；购物；工作室

examination_example.sentence: In those days, it was hard to find running water and <highlight>shops</highlight> where to buy things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那个年代，很难找到自来水和商店买东西。

examination_example.sentence: When he was leaving, the <highlight>shop</highlight> keeper suddenly told him that the <highlight>shop</highlight> had a special offer on ears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他离开时，店主突然告诉他，商店里的耳朵有特价。

examination_example.sentence: At Christmas, most <highlight>shops</highlight> are short of hands, so you may find something to do there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在圣诞节，大多数商店都人手不足，所以你可以在那里找点事做。

examination_example.sentence: Where a person decides to <highlight>shop</highlight> depends on his or her personal values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个人决定去哪里购物取决于他或她的个人价值观。

examination_example.sentence: 3D printing will revolutionize the way we <highlight>shop</highlight>, the way we manufacture and the way we treat sick people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 3D打印将彻底改变我们的购物方式、生产方式和治疗病人的方式。

examination_example.sentence: When <highlight>shopping</highlight>, we can use fewer paper bags and reuse them if we have some.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 购物时，我们可以少用纸袋，如果我们有的话可以重复使用。

word_usage.usage: 表示“去购物”，通常应说go shopping。类似的用法还有go swimming 去游泳，go fishing 去钓鱼等。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 美国英语中的普通用词，指一般的商店，规模可大可小；在英国英语中可指出售各类物品的大商店，如大型超市或百货商店。
英国英语中的普通用词，一般指零售商店，在美国英语中则指出售某一种商品的小商店。
